RawLine: TNPC_31076002,接著要請你釀造{color=#cc0000}瑞露酒{/color}，這是難度約為{color=#cc0000}六{/color}的{color=#cc0000}白酒{/color}，品質方面也拜託了。,接着要请你酿造{color=#cc0000}瑞露酒{/color}，这是难度约为{color=#cc0000}六{/color}的{color=#cc0000}白酒{/color}，品质方面也拜托了。

Items.r: 接著要請你釀造{color=#cc0000}瑞露酒{/color}，這是難度約為{color=#cc0000}六{/color}的{color=#cc0000}白酒{/color}，品質方面也拜託了。

Items.mt: Next, I'll ask you to brew Rui Lu, which is a white wine with a difficulty level of about 6, and I'll take care of the quality.
